mapper.select: SELECT IW_NUMBER, IW_TITLE, IW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as IW_REGDATE, IW_VIEWS, IW_OPEN_YN, (SELECT AD_NAME FROM TBL_ADMIN WHERE AD_CODE='${writerMemberCodeAd}') as AD_NAME FROM TBL_INFO_W WHERE IW_NUMBER = ${seq}
SELECT IW_NUMBER, IW_TITLE, IW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as IW_REGDATE, IW_VIEWS, IW_OPEN_YN, IW_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE FROM TBL_INFO_W
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_INFO_W(IW_NUMBER, IW_TITLE, IW_CONTENT, IW_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE, IW_REGDATE, IW_VIEWS, IW_OPEN_YN) VALUES(nextval('seq_admin_info'), #{title}, #{content}, #{writerMemberCode}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0, #{openYN})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_INFO_W SET IW_TITLE=#{title}, IW_CONTENT=#{content}, IW_OPEN_YN=#{openYN} WHERE IW_NUMBER=#{seq}
